content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To assist you with your HVAC needs, may I please have your name?
Thanks, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability for your location?
One moment while I check if we serve your area...

I'm sorry, Linda, but I'm having trouble confirming service availability at your address due to unclear location information. Could you please double-check and provide any nearby landmarks or a zip code?
Oh, let me see... It's near the old library and my zip code is 62704.
Thank you for the additional information, Linda. Let me check again...

Unfortunately, I still cannot confirm whether we serve your area at this time. I recommend calling our customer support directly for help or visiting our website for more info. I apologize for the inconvenience.
